title: You must be Level 7 to Create a Discussion
body:
So, I've recently joined the boards after getting to level 8 (and almost 3/4ths of the way to 9) in a few games, and I wanted to post a replay of a 15/0/4 game so I can get people to critique me and tell me what I'm doing wrong, what I'm doing right, _et cetera_. Unfortunately, the Boards doesn't seem to recognize that I'm level 7... or even Level 6.

Is it just a waiting game, or is there an issue with the Boards?

replies.body: Yup, just some waiting for your account to sync up here.  Everything already looks to be in the clear!
